total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 3s.
Q2: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 0s.
Q3: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 8s.
Q4: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 2s.
Q5: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 6s.
Q6: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 4s.
Q7: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 1s.
Q8: For each identified area, determine the pattern of the surrounding numbers.
Q9: Based on the patterns identified in Q8, determine the rules for changing the numbers in the identified areas.
Q10: Apply the rules determined in Q9 to the input grid to generate the output grid.

Q1: Identify the pattern of the transformation from the input grid to the output grid in the examples.
Q2: Identify the areas in the input grid of the quiz that match the pattern identified in Q1.
Q3: Apply the transformation pattern identified in Q1 to the areas identified in Q2 in the input grid of the quiz.
Q4: Verify if the transformed grid matches the format of the output grid in the examples. If not, identify the discrepancies and adjust the transformation pattern accordingly.
Q5: Apply the adjusted transformation pattern to the input grid of the quiz.
